job_3331088044:
Department: Technology



Employment Type: Full Time



Location: Israel



Reporting To: Amir Gat



Description



CentralNic is looking for an exceptional full-stack developer to take our tech products to the next level. You'll have the opportunity to design, develop and scale a variety of projects with different backend and frontend stacks. Our platform integrates super-large datasets consisting of millions of sub-second records with self developed internal products to managed, lead and optimize our logic. Therefore, you'll work closely to the business side of things so even small creative tech solutions can lead to amazing results.



Key outcomes of the role

 Drive, design, develop and scale a variety of projects with different backend and frontend stacks
 Lead and optimize our logic
 Provide creative thinking
 Create small tech solutions that can lead to amazing results 
 Organise and manage a team around you 

About You

 Have a passion for data pipelines, high-scale automations and building products from zero
 Bring demonstrable experience in JS/TypeScript/Python (alongside React)
 Enjoy a fast-paced environment with the ability to prioritize, define and move quickly between tasks
 Bring the experience to create, learn and modify complex time-series queries
 Be able to learn new and complex tasks quickly 
 Be happy to work independently 
 Be curious, research, and ask questions
 Demonstrate excellent communication skills, both oral and in writing
 Have exceptional organisational skills and attention to detail
 Be a creative thinker, always thinking “how can we”
 Show a strong desire to succeed and make a difference

Experience And Skills That Will Help You Succeed

 A proven track record of working with GCP, Netlify, Render 
 Experience with large-scale cloud architectures 
 The ability to recruit and build a team

Tech Stack Experience In

 Airbyte, BigQuery, RedwoodJS (TypseCript, React, Prisma, Apollo, GraphQL), Python, Nest alongside others

What we offer



There are many reasons to come on board our team of talented professionals, but here are just a few…

 We are collaborative, fair, consciously inclusive, and flexible
 We trust, value, and support our people to make the difference
 We believe that diversity of thought and experience provides the platform for innovation and creativity
 We invest in the development of our people to drive our ambitions forward
 We offer a range of benefits (including your choice of tech) and a competitive package 
 We offer a great work environment in an internationally successful enterprise in the online services industry
job_3372582342:
Attention all talented Frontend engineers 
Wisor AI, an early stage and well funded startup, is now looking for an experienced Frontend developer - with React expertise - to join a growing and dynamic R&D team. 
Wisor is growing fast! Join our journey early on and let’s grow together!
About Wisor AI: AI-based pricing optimization and shipment automation web platform designed to eliminate inefficiencies regarding freight pricing, placement, and shipping in general. 
About the role: As a Frontend developer you will work closely with our design & Product team, and take full ownership of all web development tasks and UI design implementation. You will be expected to display independence and accountability in taking tasks to the finish line. 
Roles & Responsibilities:
Take ownership of all front-end applications and their CI/CD pipelines
Design, estimate and develop solutions for new feature requests together with product team
Review pull requests to ensure high quality and maintainable solutions
Write clean, readable, quality and testable code writing
Implement new features and build pixel-perfect, buttery smooth UIs that match designs.
Integrate third-party API’s and SDK’s
Write unit and integration tests and make sure other team members do the same.
Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks
Follow-up new evolutions of technology and take initiative to keep the stack up to date
Requirements
3+ years of React development experience
Self-motivated, agile, passionate about software development and Independent learner
Proven software development capabilities
A passion for UI/UX and an attention to details.
Solid knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Typescript.
Excellent problem-solving skills
A team player with strong communication skills and a positive attitude.
You have a strong work ethic. You like to get things done and are willing to go the extra mile.
Advantages
Proven experience working with Redux, NextJs and MUI libraries
Startup experience
Cloud development (AWS)
Familiarity with micro-services architectures, and ideally have seen them in operation at a global scale.
